title: Resolve Incorrect Bill Payment
description: A customer used bill pay to send money to a utility company, but entered the wrong account number and the payment was not credited.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the specific bill payment in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the payment and confirms the details with the customer.

tasks.description: Initiate a payment trace to determine the status of the funds.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent starts a trace and finds the payment was rejected by the utility company's bank.

tasks.description: Once funds are returned, credit the customer's account and advise them to resubmit the payment with the correct account number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent returns the money to the customer's account and provides clear instructions for resubmission.
